About Me

Let me tell you few things...

BIO

I am a Self taught IOS Developer with experience in developing IOS apps for my own projects. I have little bit experience with source control and Web Development, as well as a basic understanding of terminal commands.

Skills:- Developing IOS Apps Programmatically, Auto Layout, Map Kit, Core Data, Core Location, Firebase, CocoPods, Image Caching, 3D Touch Quick actions, Peek and Pop, Downloading Images asynchronously.

Languages:- Swift, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP.

Internship

Company:- AcknoTech Software Solutions.

I have done 6 months internship at AcknoTech as Software Developer where I learned IOS Development and Developed login, registration, profile and customer dashbord screens for RealMilk app.

IOS App

Worked on Click App

In Click App User can able to browse, download and share images from internet. I used flickr Api to get and search images. User can able to get images based on Location, category and manual search. Github Link :- github.com/abdulmuneerahmed/Foodie
